name: Emerson Climate Technologies
overview: Emerson Climate Technologies, Inc. manufactures heating, ventilation, air conditioning, and refrigeration products for residential, industrial, and commercial applications. The company also offers oil and gas solutions. Its products are used in commercial and transport refrigeration systems, residential and commercial air conditioning systems, and industrial and residential ventilation applications. The company also provides system design or testing, distribution, education and training, energy management, and on-site monitoring services. It has locations in Asia Pacific, Canada, Europe, the United States, Latin America, the Middle East, and Africa. The company is headquartered in Sidney, Ohio. Emerson Climate Technologies, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of EECO, Inc.

offices.address1: Emerson Climate Technologies, Inc. 1675 West Campbell Road
